Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html#/s:FP15.name: gamePlayScene()
Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html#/s:FP15.abstract: Switch to the main game play scene

Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html#/s:FP15.name: gameWonScene(previousGuesses:)
Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html#/s:FP15.abstract: Switch to the game won scene and pass the number of guesses

Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html.name: GameSceneDelegate
Protocols/GameSceneDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate to switch between scenes in the game.

Protocols/GameSprite.html.name: GameSprite
Protocols/GameSprite.html.abstract: Protocol for game sprites that require touch behaviour.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.name: applicationWillResignActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.abstract: Sent when the application is about to move from active to inactive state. This can occur for certain types of temporary interruptions (such as an incoming phone call or SMS message) or when the user quits the application and it begins the transition to the background state. This method may eventually be used to pause the game. Currently not used.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.name: applicationDidEnterBackground(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.abstract: This method releases shared resources, save user data, invalidate timers, and store enough application state information to restore your application to its current state in case it is terminated later. Currently not used.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.name: applicationWillEnterForeground(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.abstract: This method is called as part of the transition from the background to the active state. Currently not used.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.name: applicationDidBecomeActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.abstract: This method restarts any tasks that were paused (or not yet started) while the application was inactive. Currently not used.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.name: applicationWillTerminate(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/s:FC15Diner_De.abstract: Called when the application is about to terminate. Currently not used.

Classes/GameSpriteNull.html#/s:FC15Diner.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameSpriteNull.html#/s:FC15Diner.abstract: Satisfy the NSCoder required init, as this class inherits from others.

Classes/Customer.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deduc.name: checkIngredients(_:)
Classes/Customer.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deduc.abstract: This method is called in response to receiving a PizzaSubmitted notification, and posts either a GameWon or GameFailed notification depending on if the guess is correct or not.

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: viewWillLayoutSubviews()
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Controls what game scene we are currently displaying

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: menuScene()
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Displays the menu scene using a delegate

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: gamePlayScene()
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Displays the game play scene using a delegate

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: gameWonScene(previousGuesses:)
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Displays the game won scene using a delegate

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: gameLostScene()
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Displays the game lost scene using a delegate

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:vC15D.name: supportedInterfaceOrientations
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:vC15D.abstract: Ensure the game is always set to landscape

Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.name: didReceiveMemoryWarning()
Classes/GameViewController.html#/s:FC15D.abstract: Release any cached data, images, etc that aren’t in use

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_D.name: gameSceneDelegate
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_D.abstract: Delegate to handle the displaying of game scenes.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_D.name: summaryPanel
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_D.abstract: Summary panel to display the game won text.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: didMove(to:)
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: When the scene loads, this method creates and displays all the elements in the scene.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: createSummaryPanel()
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Creates a summary panel to display text.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: createPlayAgainButton()
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Creates a play again button sprite using Button.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: addTextToSprite(sprite:text:name:position:)
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Updates a given sprite with new text.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: addTextToSummaryPanel()
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Updates the summary panel with text based on the number of guesses it took to win.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: touchesBegan(_:with:)
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Detect button taps switch to either menu or game scenes using the GameSceneDelegate.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: gameCenterViewControllerDidFinish(_:)
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Dismiss the scene when the user has finished interacting with it.

Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameWonScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_D.abstract: Satisfy the NSCoder required init, as this class inherits from others.

Classes/Button.html#/s:vC15Diner_Deducti.name: action
Classes/Button.html#/s:vC15Diner_Deducti.abstract: The name of the action will be set after the button is initialised.

Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.name: onTouch()
Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.abstract: Posts a notification with the name of the notificationAction parameter.

Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.name: onDrag(touch:)
Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.abstract: Adds onDrag to conform with the GameSprite protocol. Unused.

Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.name: onDrop()
Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.abstract: Adds onDrop to conform with the GameSprite protocol. Unused.

Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.name: init(coder:)
Classes/Button.html#/s:FC15Diner_Deducti.abstract: Satisfy the NSCoder required init, as this class inherits from others.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.name: gameSceneDelegate
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.abstract: Delegate to handle the displaying of game scenes.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.name: summaryPanel
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.abstract: Summary panel to display the Oh no! You ran out of time text.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: createSummaryPanel()
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Creates a summary panel to display text.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: createPlayAgainButton()
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Creates a play again button sprite using Button.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: addTextToSprite(sprite:text:name:addPulse:dropDown:)
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Updates a given sprite with new text and an optional animation. This is used for displaying text on buttons as well as the summary panel.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: didMove(to:)
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: When the scene loads, this method creates and displays all the elements in the scene.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: touchesBegan(_:with:)
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Detect button taps switch to either menu or game scenes using the GameSceneDelegate.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: gameCenterViewControllerDidFinish(_:)
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Dismiss the scene when the user has finished interacting with it.

Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameLostScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Satisfy the NSCoder required init, as this class inherits from others.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.name: gameSceneDelegate
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.abstract: Delegate to handle the displaying of game scenes.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.name: selectedNode
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.abstract: The GameSprite that the player has most recently interacted with.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.name: secondsLeft
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:vC15Diner_.abstract: The length of the game - currently always a minute.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: didMove(to:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: When the scene loads, a randomised set of ingredients is generated using IngredientsListGenerator, then the Customer selects three of them as the correct answer (to form the Model). It also displays all the View elements in the scene (the pizza, the ingredients, the timer, etc.) and starts a Timer. It listens for a GameWon notification, to move to the game won scene using the GameSceneDelegate.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: createCountDownDisplay()
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Creates a view for the countdown timer.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: createIngredients(ingredients:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Iterate through an array of ingredients and create views for each.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: timeToString(time:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Convert a time interval into 00:00 string format.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: updateTimer()
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Update the countdown timer text and use the GameSceneDelegate to end the game and switch to the GameLostScene if time has run out.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: whenGameWon()
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: End the game and switch to the GameWonScene passing in the number of guesses it took, using the GameSceneDelegate.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: touchesBegan(_:with:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Handle tap behaviour. If the tap is on a GameSprite, then update selectedNode accordingly and call its .onTouch() function.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: touchesMoved(_:with:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Handle drag behaviour. If selectedNode is set, call its .onDrag() function.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: touchesEnded(_:with:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Handle drop behaviour. If selectedNode is set, call its .onDrop() function.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: touchesCancelled(_:with:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Handle touch cancelled behaviour. If selectedNode is set, call its .onDrop() function.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: update(_:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Called before each frame is rendered. Not currently used.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GamePlayScene.html#/s:FC15Diner_.abstract: Satisfy the NSCoder required init, as this class inherits from others.

Classes/ArrayShuffler.html.name: ArrayShuffler
Classes/ArrayShuffler.html.abstract: Pass in an array and it will rearrange the items in the array using a Fisher-Yates Shuffle. This implements an object shuffler on GKRandomSource, which is part of GameKit.

Classes/Background.html.name: Background
Classes/Background.html.abstract: Creates an SKSpriteNode to use as a background. Sets its texture, size, position, z-position and anchorpoint.

Classes/GamePlayScene.html.name: GamePlayScene
Classes/GamePlayScene.html.abstract: The main gameplay scene sets up a new game and starts the timer. It gets the Model for the game from the IngredientsListGenerator and the Customer. It displays all the View elements for the game: a notification bar with information, the countdown timer, the ingredients, a pizza to drag the ingredients onto, a submit button, and previous guesses (if any have been made).

Classes/GameLostScene.html.name: GameLostScene
Classes/GameLostScene.html.abstract: This scene appears when the timer has run out and the player has not guessed the correct combination of ingredients. It has a panel saying, Oh no! You ran out of time, and buttons to either play again, or return to the menu screen.

Classes/Button.html.name: Button
Classes/Button.html.abstract: Used by all the buttons in the game and menus. Sets position, and texture of the button from the Buttons texture atlas. Handles tap behaviour.

Classes/GameWonScene.html.name: GameWonScene
Classes/GameWonScene.html.abstract: This scene appears when the player has correctly guessed the ingredients requested by the customer. It has a panel displaying different text depending on the number of guesses it took to win, and a sparkle particle effect in the background. The user has the option of playing again or returning to the menu.

Classes/Ingredient.html.name: Ingredient
Classes/Ingredient.html.abstract: This scene appears when the player has correctly guessed the ingredients requested by the customer. It has a panel displaying different text depending on the number of guesses it took to win, and a sparkle particle effect in the background. The user has the option of playing again or returning to the menu.

Classes/GameViewController.html.name: GameViewController
Classes/GameViewController.html.abstract: Controls the main game scenes in co-ordination with GameSceneDelegate.

Classes/Customer.html.name: Customer
Classes/Customer.html.abstract: The Customer selects the correct ingredients from a list of the available ingredients. It listens for the PizzaSubmitted event, compares the submitted ingredients to the correct ingredients, then posts either a GameWon or GameFailed notification.

Classes/GameSpriteNull.html.name: GameSpriteNull
Classes/GameSpriteNull.html.abstract: Null version of GameSprite. This is needed so that the selectedNode in GamePlayScene always conforms to the GameSprite protocol. It is an null object for when the player taps something other than an instance of GameSprite (such as the background).

Classes/AppDelegate.html.name: AppDelegate
Classes/AppDelegate.html.abstract: The Application Delegate receives application-level messages, and can respond accordingly.
